Carl Wilhelmsons målarsk. 25-28, komsthögsk. 29-30, Otte Sköldis miåli:s:k. 311. S’tud:res. t. TysM., Ital. o. Sicilien 32, Danm. 3(2, 34, 315, Tyslkl. 36. Bl. utförda arb.: portr. av Per Ekström, J. translated: Joann, Sven Ottoson, artist, Le-karyd, Alvesta, b. 3/3/08 in Aringås, Kronoburg County, 1st child of bank cashier Carl Otto Johansson and Anna Fernström. — Studied at Carl Wilhelmson's painting school from 1925-1928, art college from 1929-1930, and Otte Sköld's painting school in 1931. Studied in Germany, Italy, and Sicily in 1932, Denmark in 1933 and 1934, and Germany in 1935. Among the works completed are portraits of Per Ekström, J.A. Göith, Wilhelm Smith, and rural landscapes. Represented in Västerås art gallery, Småland Museum in Växjö, and private collections.
